mapper.select: select r.board_no,r.title,r.time_posted,r.content,r.id,r.img, m.id,m.password,m.email,m.name,m.tel,m.enabled from (select row_number() over(order by board_no desc) as rnum,board_no,title,time_posted, content,id,img from ko_board) r, ko_member m where r.id=m.id and rnum between #{getStartRowNumber} and #{getEndRowNumber}
mapper.insert: insert into ko_board(board_no, title, time_posted, content, id,img) values(ko_board_seq.nextval,#{title} ,sysdate,#{content}, #{memberVO.id},#{img})
mapper.select: select r.board_no,r.title,r.time_posted,r.content,r.id,r.img, m.id,m.password,m.email,m.name,m.tel,m.enabled from (select row_number() over(order by board_no asc) as rnum,board_no,title,time_posted, content,id,img from ko_board) r, ko_member m where board_no = #{value} and r.id=m.id
select count(*) from ko_board_comment where board_no = #{boardNo}

select c.comment_no,c.comment_content,c.comment_time,c.id,c.board_no from (select row_number() over(order by comment_no asc) as rnum,comment_no,comment_content, comment_time,id,board_no from ko_board_comment where board_no=#{boardNo}) c where c.board_no=#{boardNo} and rnum between #{getStartRowNumber} and #{getEndRowNumber}
